word_descriptions.ah: An expression of realization or surprise.
word_descriptions.ai: I have (first person singular present of avoir).
word_descriptions.as: You have (second person singular present of avoir).
word_descriptions.au: To the; contraction of à le.
word_descriptions.ça: That; used to refer to a thing or idea.
word_descriptions.de: Of, from; indicating possession or origin.
word_descriptions.do: A musical note, equivalent to C.
word_descriptions.du: Of the; contraction of de le.
word_descriptions.es: Are; second person singular present of être.
word_descriptions.et: And; used to connect words or phrases.
word_descriptions.ha: An expression of surprise or amusement.
word_descriptions.il: He, it; third person singular masculine pronoun.
word_descriptions.me: Me; reflexive pronoun used for the first person.
word_descriptions.na: Short for 'nana', colloquial term for a girl or girlfriend.
word_descriptions.ni: Neither, nor; used to connect two negative phrases.
word_descriptions.no: An informal term for a number or a refusal.
word_descriptions.oh: An expression of surprise or admiration.
word_descriptions.sa: His, her, its; possessive adjective for feminine nouns.
word_descriptions.si: If; used to introduce conditional clauses.
word_descriptions.ta: Your; possessive adjective for feminine nouns (informal).
word_descriptions.te: You; reflexive pronoun for the second person.
word_descriptions.un: One; a number or indefinite article.
word_descriptions.va: Goes; third person singular present of aller.
